fields.description: number of records to retrieve from screenpipe per page
fields.name: pageSize

fields.description: custom prompt to override part of the system prompt for comment generation
fields.name: customCommentPrompt

fields.description: Specific window name to filter the screen data, for example 'gmail', 'john', 'slack', 'myCodeFile.tsx', etc. this will filter out audio
fields.name: windowName

fields.description: Type of content to analyze: 'ocr', 'audio', or 'all'. OCR usually contains more content, so it's recommended to choose either OCR or audio rather than 'all' for better performance.
fields.name: contentType
